mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Product(
) SELECT Product_ID,DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d'), SUM(Order_Count),SUM(Order_Amount),#{createId}, NOW() FROM TB_Order_Product A, TB_Order B WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y/%m/%d') AND B.Order_Process_CD !='0299' AND B.Order_ID = A.Order_ID GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d'),A.Product_Id

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Product(
) SELECT Product_ID,DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y%m'), SUM(Order_Count),SUM(Order_Amount),#{createId}, NOW() FROM TB_Order_Product A, TB_Order B WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_dt,'%Y%m')= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m') AND B.Order_Process_CD !='0299' AND B.Order_ID = A.Order_ID GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y%m'),A.Product_Id
